snippet: Vladimir Tarasenko scored on a power play early in the third period, Jake Allen earned his second straight shutout, and St. Louis’s winning streak reached six games.
abstract: St Louis Blues beat New Jersey Devils, 1-0, extending winning streak to six games; other NHL news noted.
lead_paragraph: Vladimir Tarasenko scored on a power play early in the third period, Jake Allen earned his second straight shutout, and St. Louis’s winning streak reached six games.

headline.main: Blues Edge Devils to Extend Streak
